p.k: Bro Brawl / Family Troubles / Pigeons / Lil' Squid The Bears participate in a brother-themed game show against Panda's ex-BFF, Tom, and his roommates. / Baby Grizz lives on the set of a sitcom in which he stars. But when a cooler kid joins the cast, Grizz feels threatened. / Grizz becomes best buds with a flock of pigeons. / The Baby Bears build a submarine and explore the depths of an aquarium so they can bring a lost squid to its family.
